author: ttpurplern
title: Great staff, clean rooms, excellent location!
text: We stayed four days. The room was small, but had everything we could think about needing including a complete kitchen. There was a window that opened and I could feel the snowflakes! The bar was lacking specialty items such as brandy, but did have cold, bubbly prosecco! The staff was very helpful and joyful!
